description: Default agent for DFW Christmas Lights Finder project
instructions: CRITICAL: NEVER commit or push directly to main branch - NO EXCEPTIONS
ALWAYS create a new feature branch before making ANY changes
Branch naming: use descriptive names like 'fix/pdf-title-spacing' or 'feat/feedback-ui'
Commit messages: be very descriptive - explain WHAT changed and WHY
After committing, push the feature branch to origin
Create a detailed PR to main with summary of all changes
Wait for PR approval before any code reaches main
After PR is merged, switch to main and pull latest before starting new work
